Package pl.pkozuch.poker.serveractions

package pl.pkozuch.poker.serveractions
  • Class
    Description
    BalanceAction
    Balance action - sends Player back his actual balance
    CreateGameAction
    Creates game action - creates Game on server with specified ANTE
    HelpAction
    Help Action shows list of available actions
    JoinGameAction
    Join Action allows Player to join selected game
    ListGamesAction
    List Games Action shows list of available games with number of people in lobby, ante and current game state
    QuitGameAction
     
    ServerAction
     
    ServerActionFactory
    Factory class which creates needed actions based on user input
    StartGameAction
     
    UsedViaReflection
    Marks method/variable which is invoked by reflection
